title: How to become a contractor - Quora

response.answer_text: Becoming a building contractor isn’t as tough as many people would think. It requires a lot of perseverance and effort to become a successful one. To become one, you’ll need to get either an associate’s or bachelor’s degree in a construction related field, get a position in construction, get licensed, and get certified. There is a lot more that goes into becoming a building contractor. For more of that information, field experts at The Emmett Group wrote a post about what it takes to become a building contractor.
